import React from 'react'; function BookShelf(props){ const {books,shelfName,onShelfChanged} = props return (

{shelfName}

    { books.map((book) => ( book &&
  1. { (book.imageLinks && book.imageLinks.thumbnail) ?
    :

    Cover image not found

    {JSON.stringify(book)}
    }
    {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. )) }
) } export default BookShelf
